mission_(volume_spec_notes): Decides whether a user message requires a deeplink action; upstream of Lane 12; parallel to Lane 10.
output_contract_(from_full_dataset_spec): tool_call: forbidden (deeplink action mapping is separate) | Positive samples must require launching/controlling an app, not just explaining it
languages: en, zh-hk, th, zh-hant, zh-hans, pt-br, es, de, fr, it, ja, ko, hi, vi
count_target_allocation_rule: Allocate per language by normalized weights (sum=102%) then round-to-nearest (half-up) and adjust to preserve total exactly.
